column4: so is there any way of keeping / backing up my settings and then restoring them once i've done a clean install of feisty?
any of your user-specific settings should be in your home directory.  back that up, including all the hidden dot-files.
Also you might want to get your package list so you can just toss that into an apt-get install to get all your packages back.
use something like dpkg -l | awk '/^ii/ { print $2 }'
